name: keyuebao
description: A present for my girlfriend, to help give a sense of perspective

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run copy && npm run javascript && npm run html && npm run css && npm run images
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd build && git init . && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy"; git push "git@github.com:blakeembrey/keyuebao.git" master:gh-pages --force && rm -rf .git

author: Blake Embrey <hello@blakeembrey.com>
